author: buffalonews
title: Area golf for Oct. 3
text:
Area golf
WNYPGA Assistants
at Kahkwa Club (Erie, Pa.)
1. Rodney Blair (Transit Valley) 75
T2. Tim Falkner (Crag Burn) 77
T2. Brendan Allen (CC of Buffalo) 77
4. John Edwards (River Oaks) 78
5. Jonathan Decker (CC of Buffalo) 80
6. Jay Lindell (Park) 81
T7. Chris Stoddard (Park) 82
T7. Matt Ferrie (Peek’n Peak) 82
SHERIDAN: Memorial 4-Man Scramble — Bruce McDonald/Bill Samson/Norv Souter/Ray Souter 60. 2-Man President’s Cup Tournament — Joe Abbarno/Dana Harrington def. Norm Nieminen/Ray Souter 3 & 2.
